books.author: by Prince Harry
books.description: The Duke of Sussex details his struggles with the royal family, loss of his mother, service in the British Army and marriage to Meghan Markle.
books.name: SPARE

books.author: by Ron DeSantis
books.description: The Florida governor gives his account of his achievements and shares his opinions about the political left.
books.name: THE COURAGE TO BE FREE

books.author: by Bessel van der Kolk
books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery.
books.name: THE BODY KEEPS THE SCORE

books.author: by Jennette McCurdy
books.description: The actress and filmmaker describes her eating disorders and difficult relationship with her mother.
books.name: I'M GLAD MY MOM DIED

books.author: by Bernie Sanders with John Nichols
books.description: The Vermont senator depicts the impact capitalism has on key areas of our lives and ways to address this.
books.name: IT'S OK TO BE ANGRY ABOUT CAPITALISM

books.author: by James Patterson and Matt Eversmann with Chris Mooney
books.description: A collection of stories about police officers.
books.name: WALK THE BLUE LINE

books.author: by Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady shares personal stories and the tools she uses to deal with difficult situations.
books.name: THE LIGHT WE CARRY

books.author: by bell hooks
books.description: The late feminist icon explores the causes of a polarized society and the meaning of love.
books.name: ALL ABOUT LOVE

books.author: by Jenny Odell
books.description: The author of "How to Do Nothing" looks at how we experience time and what we could do to reclaim it.
books.name: SAVING TIME

books.author: by Robin Wall Kimmerer
books.description: A botanist and member of the Citizen Potawatomi Nation espouses having an understanding and appreciation of plants and animals.
books.name: BRAIDING SWEETGRASS

books.author: by Katherine May
books.description: The author of “Wintering” shares her journey to reconnect with her sense of wonder and awe.
books.name: ENCHANTMENT

books.author: by Beth Moore
books.description: The founder of Living Proof Ministries details key moments from her life and her 2018 break with the Southern Baptist movement.
books.name: ALL MY KNOTTED-UP LIFE

books.author: by Gabor Maté with Daniel Maté
books.description: The potential ways in which trauma and stress from modern-day living can affect our physical health.
books.name: THE MYTH OF NORMAL

books.author: by Sister Jean Dolores Schmidt with Seth Davis
books.description: The team chaplain for Loyola’s men’s basketball team recounts experiences from her more than 100 years of existence.
books.name: WAKE UP WITH PURPOSE!

books.author: edited by Nikole Hannah-Jones, Caitlin Roper, Ilena Silverman and Jake Silverstein
books.description: Viewing America’s entanglement with slavery and its legacy, in essays adapted and expanded from The New York Times Magazine.
books.name: THE 1619 PROJECT
